paper_abstract: Optimal descriptors calculated with Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System (SMILES) notation have been used in quantitative structure-property relationships (QSPR) modeling electrochemical half-wave potential of benzoxazine derivatives by one-variable correlations. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: QSPR modeling of the half-wave potentials of benzoxazines by optimal descriptors calculated with the SMILES
